body_html: Yeah @xuancong84 the non-adjacent advanced indexing logic takes a while to wrap your head around, but it does make sense as to why the issue exists, and its largely to do with the fact that you can insert an arbitrary number of dimensions via your indexing.

body: Yeah @xuancong84 the non-adjacent advanced indexing logic takes a while to wrap your head around, but it does make sense as to why the issue exists, and its largely to do with the fact that you can insert an arbitrary number of dimensions via your indexing.
